issue.title: undefined reference linker errors for functions in QTest

content.raw:
Thanks for the complete report Johannes.

@hsu mailed me yesterday about this issue yesterday, so yes, it is already a bug. Let me give it a look. In the meantime, you can use this patch made by John:

```
#!diff

diff -r 972e25123462 gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Feb 11 17:32:02 2013 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Feb 12 13:46:10 2013 +0100
@@ -111,6 +111,7 @@
                                 gazebo_model_editor
                                 gzqtpropertybrowser
                                 ${QT_LIBRARIES}
+                                QtTest
                                 ${ogre_libraries}
                                 ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
                                 pthread)
diff -r 972e25123462 tools/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/tools/CMakeLists.txt	Mon Feb 11 17:32:02 2013 -0800
+++ b/tools/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Feb 12 13:46:10 2013 +0100
@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
 gz_install_executable(gzsdf)
 
 add_executable(gztopic gztopic.cc)
-target_link_libraries(gztopic gazebo_msgs gazebo_common gazebo_transport pthread gazebo_gui ${QT_LIBRARIES})
+target_link_libraries(gztopic gazebo_msgs gazebo_common gazebo_transport pthread gazebo_gui ${QT_LIBRARIES} QtTest)
 gz_install_executable(gztopic)
 
 add_executable(gzlog gzlog.cc)
```
content.html:
Thanks for the complete report Johannes.

@hsu mailed me yesterday about this issue yesterday, so yes, it is already a bug. Let me give it a look. In the meantime, you can use this patch made by John:

diff -r 972e25123462 gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt Mon Feb 11 17:32:02 2013 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/gui/CMakeLists.txt Tue Feb 12 13:46:10 2013 +0100
@@ -111,6 +111,7 @@
                                 gazebo_model_editor
                                 gzqtpropertybrowser
                                 ${QT_LIBRARIES}
+                                QtTest
                                 ${ogre_libraries}
                                 ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
                                 pthread)
diff -r 972e25123462 tools/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/tools/CMakeLists.txt  Mon Feb 11 17:32:02 2013 -0800
+++ b/tools/CMakeLists.txt  Tue Feb 12 13:46:10 2013 +0100
@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
 gz_install_executable(gzsdf)

 add_executable(gztopic gztopic.cc)
-target_link_libraries(gztopic gazebo_msgs gazebo_common gazebo_transport pthread gazebo_gui ${QT_LIBRARIES})
+target_link_libraries(gztopic gazebo_msgs gazebo_common gazebo_transport pthread gazebo_gui ${QT_LIBRARIES} QtTest)
 gz_install_executable(gztopic)

 add_executable(gzlog gzlog.cc)
